name: Avoid Artifacts with High Depth of Nested Subqueries
CWE-79: Avoid cross-site scripting DOM vulnerabilities
CWE-91: Avoid XPath injection vulnerabilities
Avoid Artifacts with SQL statement including subqueries
Avoid using submitted markup containing "form" and "formaction" attributes
Avoid using submit markup related to "form" with id attribute
Avoid using autofocus and onfocus in submitted markup
Avoid using autofocus and onblur in submitted markup
Avoid using javascript or expression in the CSS file
Avoid using video poster attributes in combination with javascript
Avoid hosting HTML code in iframe srcdoc
Avoid using onscroll event with autofocus input
Avoid having iframe inside a tag
Avoid using setData in ondragstart with attribute draggable set to true
Avoid using oninput in body containing input autofocus
Avoid using source tag in video/audio with event handler
Avoid white-listing the "dirname" attribute in user generated content
Avoid using import with external URI
Avoid enabling autocomplete "on" for inputs/forms
Enable Content Security Policy when creating an AngularJS application
Avoid disabling Strict Contextual Escaping (SCE) when created
Avoid using unsanitized AngularJS application
Avoid disabling withCredentials option for the httpProvider
Ensure the X-XSS-Protection header is enabled
